text.text_translated: Are things getting worse every day, and is progress an impossible goal? In his book *Enlightenment Now*, Steven Pinker looks at the history of human progress and finds good news. He says that we are living longer, healthier, freer, and happier lives. The **Enlightenment** was an important period in history. During this time, ideas about reason and science became very important. However, Pinker argues that the real problem is that these values are now under attack. He says that some leaders and commentators use people's negative feelings, like distrust. They also use the belief that you cannot change things. When this happens, we are in danger. We could cause serious damage to important systems like democracy and world co-operation.
